Text: can you please upload the pre game, post game

Pregame here was basically the entire day Sunday. When I turned on the tele at 10am, it was already football. This release is already nearly 4 hours long anyways, I don't think much is gained by including pregame, the best ads are during.

Great quality, But with mine, the audio and video went out of sync at about the 1 hour mark. Still watched it, kinda ruined the commercials and the half time show though.

Awesome! As far as I can tell, you are literally the only person on the entire internet who uploaded the complete Superbowl experience with commercials + halftime show. Thank you so much for this!

Audio and video go out of sync in the commercials after the 4:03 mark of the second quarter (1:01:43 of the video) all the way to the end of the video. Downloaded it again and went out of sync in the exact same lapse so i don't think it's my computer plaing me tricks

Hated the outcome. But hey, theres always next season!!

Love the Patriots!!!!

To answer many of the emails I have received recently:

No I will not be uploading any more football games. I am very busy these days and I am unable to commit to a rigorous encoding schedule.

If you are interested in uploading your own football torrents or know someone who is, i'd be happy to share any insights and experience.
